Pre-Game Insights: The Milwaukee Bucks will square off with the Portland Trail Blazers in NBA action at Fiserv Forum on Sunday, starting at 12:00pm AEDT.
With star players Giannis Antetokounmpo, Damian Lillard and Khris Middleton, the Bucks are looking to overcome a Trail Blazers team that includes Anfernee Simons, Shaedon Sharpe and Deni Avdija.
Stats Insider's predictive analytics model gives the Bucks an 80% chance of beating the Trail Blazers at Fiserv Forum.
The Bucks are 12-point favourites against the Trail Blazers, with odds of $1.91 available at Bet365.
According to Stats Insider's analytics model, the Trail Blazers (+12) are predicted to cover the line 55% of the time, while the 228-point over/under is expected to go over 51% of the time.
Stats Insider's predicted final score for Bucks vs Trail Blazers at Fiserv Forum on Sunday is the Bucks winning 119-109.
Giannis Antetokounmpo is expected to lead the Bucks with 32 points, 12 rebounds and 7 assists, while Anfernee Simons is projected to have 20 points, 4 rebounds and 6 assists for the Trail Blazers.
